ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] additiveType with data type Code
"This field identifies any additives introduced to the specimen before or at the time of collection. These additives may be introduced in order to preserve, maintain or enhance the particular nature or component of the specimen. Refer to HL7 Table 0371 Additive/Preservative for valid values. When multiple additives are introduced and valid individual additive codes exist but a valid value for the combination does not exist, repeating the field with individual values is most appropriate." - HL7 Version 2.8, SPM.6
Contains exactly one [1..1] containerSize with data type Physical Quantity

Contains exactly one [1..1] containerType with data type Code
"The container in or on which a specimen is transported." - HL7 Version 2.8, SPM.27

Contains zero or more [0..*] additiveType with data type Code
"This field identifies any additives introduced to the specimen before or at the time of collection. These additives may be introduced in order to preserve, maintain or enhance the particular nature or component of the specimen. Refer to HL7 Table 0371 Additive/Preservative for valid values. When multiple additives are introduced and valid individual additive codes exist but a valid value for the combination does not exist, repeating the field with individual values is most appropriate." - HL7 Version 2.8, SPM.6
Contains exactly one [1..1] containerSize with data type Physical Quantity

Contains exactly one [1..1] containerType with data type Code
"The container in or on which a specimen is transported." - HL7 Version 2.8, SPM.27
